Articles.Content:
~Hiring Now~ In our rocket corporation, we aim not to build beautiful crafts, rather highly efficient crafts of which they can most hopefully travel interplanetary. We also build just efficient crafts. MODS THAT CAN BE INCLUDED: KerbPaint, B9 Aerospace, any of the NFT Pack, KW Rocketry, Infernal Robotics, MechJeb, and Tweakscale.

Edited October 30, 2014 by Darkened Planet
Gahh! I can't change it's location and name1
This thread should be moved to the rocket builders sub-forum
Eeeerm, it isn't? Well crap. I have no clue how to do that, and I'm reeaallly new to the site. So yeah.

A mod will have to do it as only they have permissions to move threads

You should go to the kerbal network sub-forum and look for a thread titled, "Need a thread moving" then paste this pages URL In that thread and say you need it moved to the rocket builders and when a moderator (mod) sees it they will most likely move it
